short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds Net-Results related functionality to gmail.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Net-Results Gmail Plugin allows you to send emails from your Gmail account with the ability to track opens, clicks, and website visit activity. Know which prospects are engaging with what content and when. It also allows you to leverage email templates built in the Net-Results email builder within Gmail.

This Plugin is perfect for Sales Teams who send follow-up emails to prospects!
